Package com.mygdx.game.Stations

Class Station

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Core.Scriptable
      • com.mygdx.game.Stations.Station
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interactable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssemblyStation, ChopStation, CustomerCounters, HobStation, OvenStation, ToasterStation
    public abstract class Station
extends Scriptable
implements Interactable
    Defines a station object with its given name and attributes we also have the ability to "lock" a station so it can only interact with one item at a time
    Author:
    Jack Hinton, Robin Graham
